event.title: Yesterday, the first fatality in the UK caused

data.event: Yesterday, the first fatality in the UK caused by swine flu was announced.

event.title: Friday, the Health Protection Agency said

data.event: On Friday, the Health Protection Agency said confirmed swine flu cases in the UK had reached 1004.
